title: Side Chair, "B5", 1926–27
medium: Bent chrome-plated tubular steel, Eisengarn (parafin treated cotton canvas)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Upright, rectangular bent tubular steel frame; back and seat consisting of panels of brown Eisengarn canvas.

tombstone.epitaph: Side Chair, "B5", 1926–27. Bent chrome-plated tubular steel, Eisengarn (parafin treated cotton canvas). Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2007-9-1.
